Below are the suppliers that impact the Patagonia Minimalist Wading Jacket View our supply chain The Footprint Chronicles® DWR (durable water repellent) fabric finish repels light rain and snow and decreases dry times. When DWR is used in conjunction with a waterproof/breathable barrier, the DWR finish keeps the outer fabric from becoming saturated so that the breathable barrier can do its job.
